visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart comparing the estimated production of corn and wheat for the year 2020 across different countries. The chart should have a title, subtitle with a source link, and styled axes with labels. The data series should include the production values for corn and wheat for each country, with custom colors for the series. Additionally, the chart should have a zooming feature specifically for the y-axis, and the tooltip should display the production values in 1000 MT with a specific background color.

title.text: Corn vs wheat estimated production for 2020 (1000 MT)

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart that compares the estimated production of corn and wheat for the year 2020 across six countries: USA, China, Brazil, EU, India, and Russia. The chart includes a title and subtitle with a link to the source data. The x-axis represents the countries, and the y-axis represents the production in 1000 million tons. The chart allows for y-axis zooming, which is useful for detailed analysis of production values. The tooltip displays the production values in 1000 MT with a specific background color for better readability. The legend is enabled to differentiate between the two series, and custom colors are applied to the series to enhance visual distinction. Data labels are enabled for each column to show the exact production values directly on the chart.
